questions.question: Considering the product's text, what primary ingredient constitutes the majority of its composition, as explicitly stated on the packaging?

Referring to the text, what is another additional flavoring agent besides salt and vinegar?

What additional allergenic substance is mentioned on the packaging as a potential contaminant?

What preparation method is employed for the central ingredient of this food product, as indicated by the label?
What unit of measurement is utilized to quantify the net weight of the product?

What is the total net weight of the product as shown on the product's label?
